name: FNaF Into the Dark
description:
This is a very early version of a FNaF fan game I am currently working on in honor of scott cawthon and his retirement. This game is nowhere near done, and this is my first game ever. I am most active on gamejolt, so I recommed following me there :)

https://gamejolt.com/games/fnaf-intothedark/628348
